userStory.storyName: Booking Service Reservation with EUDI Wallet (cross device)
userStory.displayName: Booking Service Reservation with EUDI Wallet (cross device)
userStory.narrative:
As a EUDI Wallet User
  I want to book my reservation by present attestations from my EUDI Wallet to the requesting Relying Party (i.e. ‘Booking Service’)
  So that I can be authenticated by the Relying Party and book my reservation as part of my travel arrangements

title: Booking Service offers additional options to the user

values: Download the car rental contract as pdf pre-filled with the corresponding form fields

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
